description: Try our easy to follow Turkey Stuffing with Bacon and Herbs recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Stuffing,Seafood free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Turkey Stuffing with Bacon and Herbs Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Melt butter with olive oil in a large non-stick frying pan over a medium-low heat. Then add 1 sliced leek and diced rindless bacon and cook, stirring occasionally, for 5 minutes until leek is soft. Cool slightly.
Add 5 cups of gluten-free breadcrumbs, 1/2 cup chopped parsley, thyme, grated rind of 1 lemon and 2 tbs juice. Season with salt and pepper.
Lightly beat 1 egg, then stir into mixture until well combined.
